record.dc:title: Title of the Cultural Heritage Item
record.dc:creator: Creator or Author of the Item
record.dc:subject: Keywords or phrases related to the item
record.dc:description: A description of the cultural heritage item.
record.dc:publisher: The entity responsible for making the item available
record.dc:date: Publication or creation date of the item
record.dc:type: Genre or nature of the resource
record.dc:format: File format or physical medium of the item
record.dc:identifier: Unique identifier or URL for the item
record.dc:source: Reference to the resource from which the present resource is derived
record.dc:rights: Information about rights held in and over the resource
record.dcterms:abstract: Summary or abstract of the content
record.dcterms:tableOfContents: Table of contents for the item
record.dcterms:available: Date when the resource became or will become available
record.dcterms:issued: Date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the resource
record.dcterms:modified: Date on which the resource was changed
record.dcterms:extent: Size or duration of the resource
record.dcterms:medium: Physical or digital medium of the resource
record.dcterms:isPartOf: Reference to a larger resource of which the described resource is a part
record.dcterms:hasPart: Reference to a smaller resource that is part of the described resource
record.dcterms:isVersionOf: Reference to a related resource that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described resource
record.dcterms:hasVersion: Reference to a related resource of which the described resource is a version, edition, or adaptation
